MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH39 postcode area of North Berwick. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am to complete repairs on faulty equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:40am on Wednesday, 14 October 2020
